Body: I have an Prestigio MultiPhone 7500, and I have got a some of problems with it. The problem is when I switched on after the switch off, in that time, errors appear like "Adobe Air has unfortunately stop", "Monkey Test has unfortunately stop". It will also affect other application, when I open other application it is automatically closed.I disabled and force stop, it will work sometimes but again after sometimes it will happen the same as before. I have reset my phone many times, but it's still showing the same problems.How do I solve this problem?
Title: Problems with Monkey Test, Adobe Air, Measure

history.Text: Good Morningi had a android prestigio mobile phone model of 7500.and i have got a some of problems with my phone. the problem is when i switched on after the switch off.in that time it came like the adobe air has unfortunately stop, monkey test has unfortunately stop etc. and it will effected with other application when i open other application it is automatically closed.and also i did disable and force stop it will work sometimes but again after sometimes it will happen the same as before. many times i reset my phone but still showing the same problems.how do i solve this problem i got lots of troubles for this. thanks
problems with monkey test and adobe air, measure
